<rule id="javaee-pom-to-quarkus-00060" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="pom.xml" matches="/m:project[not(m:profiles/m:profile/m:properties/m:quarkus.package.type/text() = 'native')]">
                    <namespace prefix="m" uri="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Add Maven profile to run the Quarkus native build">
                    <message>
                    <![CDATA[
                        Leverage a Maven profile to run the Quarkus native build adding the following section to the `pom.xml` file:  

                        ```xml
                        <profiles>
                            <profile>
                                <id>native</id>
                                <activation>
                                    <property>
                                        <name>native</name>
                                    </property>
                                </activation>
                                <properties>
                                    <skipITs>false</skipITs>
                                    <quarkus.package.type>native</quarkus.package.type>
                                </properties>
                            </profile>
                        </profiles>
                        ```
                    ]]>
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#build-tool-maven" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
